text: You rifle through the pages and arrive to the incomplete dictionary. You absentmindedly whisper, 'ibo'... 'isha'... You hear a click and a groaning sound coming from behind. You look back to the entrance from where you came from and freeze - the sides of the wooden hollow you went through bulges jarringly inwards, effectively closing your way out. A last ray of dappled sunlight tantalizes your face as the entrance closes with a final groan, effectively leaving you planted in the dark, mortified.
